name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name for the accessory. It will be used as the accessory name in HomeKit.

host_ip.title: Host IP
host_ip.description: The IP of the host device that is running the sync progam.

light_ip.title: Light IP
light_ip.description: The IP of the light to be synced with the host.

light_type.title: Light type
light_type.description: The Magic Home device type, being either RGB, RGBW or RGBWW, default is RGBW.

polling_interval.title: Polling Interval
polling_interval.description: Interval in seconds in which the lights are updated, default is 1.
